@author: Sascha Narr

class cosinnus_file.utils.renderer.FileEntryRenderer¶

Bases: HierarchicalListCreateViewMixin, BaseRenderer

model¶

alias of FileEntry

classmethod render(context, myobjs, **kwargs)¶
classmethod render_list_for_user(user, request, qs_filter={}, limit=30, render_if_empty=True, **kwargs)¶

Will render a standalone list of items of the renderer’s model for a user and a request (important if there are forms in the template). This function will filter for access permissions for all of the items, but any further filtering (group, organization, etc) will have to be passed via the qs_filter dict.
